UPRIGHT MUSIC

The world's first multifunctional catalog for preserving and monetizing music

MISSION

Help artists become owners of their own content,  which brings in money daily, attracts new fans and allows for creative freedom

Project
Goals

Create a unified international music catalog

Develop an innovative tracking and monitoring system for music tracks

Make the music industry more transparent and public

Help lyricists, composers, arrangers, and music video creators gain fame and make money

Give to musicians a simple and multifunctional monetization system of creativeness

Open up a unified space for music fans and enthusiasts from all over the world, where they

FULLSCALE
ANALYTIC

Any artist and/or their representative gain access to:

Information about platforms and public places – where and how any composition is broadcasted

Statistics for each composition – where, in what format, and how popular it is

Accuracy of fulfilling the agreements established by the contract

The AUDb’s analytic will count and calculate all the figures:

Market evaluation of the artist

Dynamics of each album and track in terms of reach and revenue

Forecasting prospects based on the dynamics (in a month, a year)

All indicators in one place!

We are developing a wide range of solutions for integrating AUDB into other services:

Counters
and metrics
